short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces instances of "alt-right" to call the movement what it really is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By all counts, the alt-right movement is simply white nationalism, rebranded. This extension calls the movement what it really is...
